mapper.select: SELECT a.title as title, a.description as description, a.price as price, b.brand as brand, b.id_brand as idBrand, a.model as model, a.license_plate as licensePlate, e.color as color, e.id_color as idColor, a.motor as motor, d.phone_number as phoneNumber, a.door_number as doorNumber, a.id_seller as idSeller, f.city as City, f.id_city as idCity from publication a INNER JOIN brand b on a.id_brand=b.id_brand INNER JOIN seller c on a.id_seller=c.id_seller INNER JOIN person d on c.id_person=d.id_person INNER JOIN color e on a.id_color=e.id_color INNER JOIN city f on a.id_city=f.id_city where a.id_publication=#{idPublication} AND a.status=1
mapper.update: UPDATE publication set id_brand=#{idBrand}, id_color=#{idColor}, id_city=#{idCity}, title=#{title}, model=#{model}, door_number=#{doorNumber}, license_plate=#{licensePlate}, description=#{description}, motor=#{motor}, price=#{price}, date_publication=#{datePublication}, tx_id_user=#{transaction.txIdUser}, tx_host=#{transaction.txHost}, tx_update=#{transaction.txUpdate}, status=1 WHERE id_publication=#{idPublication}
UPDATE publication set status=#{status}, tx_id_user=#{transaction.txIdUser}, tx_host=#{transaction.txHost}, tx_update=#{transaction.txUpdate} WHERE id_publication=#{idPublication} and status=1

UPDATE image_publication set status=0, tx_id_user=#{transaction.txIdUser}, tx_host=#{transaction.txHost}, tx_update=#{transaction.txUpdate} WHERE id_image_publication=#{idImagePublication} and status=1

SELECT ipub.id_image_publication as idImagePublication, ipub.path as path FROM publication pub INNER JOIN image_publication ipub on pub.id_publication=ipub.id_publication WHERE pub.status=1 and ipub.status=1 AND pub.id_publication=#{idPublication}
